name: Teddie Levenfiche
background_summary: Teddie Levenfiche is the Co-Founder of PerfectTed, a role he has held for nearly four years, apparently scaling the company to over Â£30 million in revenue. His background includes two years as an Associate Consultant at Bain & Company, providing him with strong strategic and operational experience. He also held internships at EY, the Congress of the Republic of Colombia, and The Libra Group. Teddie is a graduate of the University of Pennsylvania and was admitted to Harvard Law School (deferred 2024), indicating a strong academic aptitude.

public_speaking_or_content.title: E8: The Rise of Matcha with Teddie Levenfiche (PerfectTed)
How PerfectTed took matcha from niche to mainstream [Interview]
